title: Core GO
description: JSON schema for core GO collection in RCSB Data Warehouse. Contains controlled vocabularies (ontologies) that describe gene products in terms of their associated biological processes, cellular components and molecular functions in a species-independent manner.

rcsb_id.description: Unique identifier of an object in GO core collection.

go_id.description: A unique seven digit identifier prefixed by 'GO:'.

rcsb_go_aspect.description: Denotes which of the three sub-ontologies (cellular component, biological process or molecular function) the term belongs to.

rcsb_go_description.description: A textual description of what the term represents.
